The superhuman distinctions achieved by: Dimension of neither perception nor non-perception
The tasks performed by Anuruddha, Nandiy: Putting out the drinking water and the rubbish bin
Eating the leftovers or throwing them out where there is little that grows, or dropping them into water that has no living creatures
Putting away the seats, drinking water, and rubbish bin, and sweeping the refectory
Setting up the pot of water for washing, drinking, or the toilet if it is empty
Sitting together for the whole night and discussing the teachings every five days
The beings who raised the cry of the Vaj: Gods of the Four Great Kings
Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
